title: Content Management Guide
description: This guide helps users set up the content management module, including installation steps and basic usage examples.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: Getting Started with the Content Management Module
Welcome to the Content Management Guide. This document will walk you through the installation and basic usage of the content management module.
To set up the project, follow these steps:

mkdir my-content-project
cd my-content-project
npm init -y
npm install --save-dev typescript @types/node
Once the setup is complete, you can start using the content management module to create and manage your content.
This guide provided an overview of setting up the content management module. For further details, refer to the API documentation.
